text: Very good family clinic. Dr Lim is very friendly and thorough. She also takes time to give advice that is clear and helpful.
Dr. Low and the clinic staff were fantastic! He was kind, detailed in his explanations, and really cared about my health. Highly recommend him!

Been seeing Dr Low for past 30 years. His genuinity, patience, and experience is over and above any other doc i've seen. The wait at his clinic might be seem long to some, I would say to each his/her own. There is free choice for anyone to go elsewhere for consult etc. In my own opinion, Dr Low and his wife are well worth any wait.

From  the many visits that I have made there, I find both Doctors Low and Lim to be very patient and detailed in their patient diagnosis-cum-interaction. They give sincere and practical advice too. They do not rush you.
I have always recovered effectively.Thank you L& L!

Dr Lim was extremely patient, despite my lengthy and clumsy account of my discomfort. She took efforts to explain detailed treatment plan in a way that I could understand. That is an assurance that I am in good hands.
